name: Cold Bleachers
description:
You're cleaning up the stadium after tonight's football game, as you always do. However, tonight you feel a little different. 

This extremely short game was made for the Cozy Autumn Jam of 2022. To me, early fall reminds me of high school football games. After everyone had gone home, there was always a certain serenity the fell on the stadium. Sometimes I would pick up the trash that people had left, and I'm not sure if anyone playing will find picking up trash comforting, but it is for me.

Controls:

Arrow keys to move

Mouse to clean up trash

Your knees aren't what they used to be, so you can't step over the seats. Use the steps.
